## Group Discussion

In your groups, please...

1. Take turns introducing yourselves with your
   - name
   - hometown
   - year at Cal
   - major
   - number of siblings + pets
   - farthest distance traveled from Cal this summer (in miles)
   
2. As a group, formulate at least **three** possible explanations for what's going on in the picture.  

3. Enter them at [pollev.com/stat20](pollev.com/stat20) or upvote existing explanations if they are very similar to your own.
